content: sunday shrug recipe by jackie rose of cady jax knits the dramatic big sister tothe saturday shrug sundayis a simple bold design that can be knit in a day can t stop won t stop #shrugstyle materials lamb and kid monstro 97 yds/skein held with dimond laine big birdie 174 yds/skein mc 2 monstro 1 big birdie cc 2 monstro 1 big birdie needles us size 15 10 mm 32 circular needles gauge approximately 10 st and 13 row in 1x1 rib = 4 square finished measurements approximately 20 tall by 15 wide/30 circumference unblocked pattern notes shrug is designed with five-4 inch stripes of alternating colors but let this be a launching place to play with yarn and gauge to create the fabric and design you desire usejogless jogwhen joining a new color directions i prefer to use the waste yarn tubular cast onfora stretchy edge for this cast on use smaller needles us 13 and cast on half the number of stitches plus 1 37 sts k2tog when joining in the round switch to size 15s when beginning regular rib or cast on 72stitches and join in the round withouttwisting place bor marker row 1 k1 p1 repeat to bor marker repeat row 1 until shrug measures approximately 20 from cast on edge then bind o� with your favorite stretchy bind o� i prefer atubular bind o� again so garment is elastic sample has 5 alternating stripes each stripe is 13 rounds of 1 x1 rib
